item.description:
The Minuteman pathway is about 11 miles from Alewife Station to Bedford. So it will be a 22 mile round trip ride. This will be a faster paced ride, so please be able to ride about 18-22 MPH. The goal of this meet-up is to have a good time while getting a workout. Ride will leave promptly at 9:35 am, and I hope to be finished around 11:30 am.

Here is an overall map of the meet-up spot: Alewife Station
Here is a closer look at the meet-up spot: Meet-up Spot

Hope you can make it!
Here is my info in case you need to get in touch:
jontramos@yahoo.com
603-759-9680

- Jon
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy with an orange messenger bag
item.why: Because the weather is warming up, and its time to get outside and on the bike! Sunday looks like it will be good riding weather!
item.name: Minute Man Trail
